Name: Powerful Explosives
Desc: Deploy and detonate a bomb that creates a round-shaped blast, clearing <color=#2BAD00>most event tiles</color> in the blast radius. Large or complex Elite enemies, as well as Boss enemies will not be affected by this blast, while <color=#2BAD00>Normal and Elite enemies will drop Resonia</color>.
Desc2: Send a mini Bangboo to ignite a powerful Ether explosive, instantly obliterating anything in the way. The range can be controlled and won't hurt Eous.
